item.title: CMSC828O: Computational and Mathematical Analysis of Biological Networks across Scales
item.description: Course Information CMSC828O: Computational and Mathematical Analysis of Biological Networks Across Scales Spring 2018 Instructor: Héctor Corrada Bravo Center for Bioinformatics and Computational Biology Department of Computer Science hcorrada@umiacs.umd.edu Office: 3114F Biomolecular Sciences Building Lecture Meeting Times Tuesday and Thursday, 9:30am-10:45am, CSI 3118 Links Check the calendar page for up-to-date course calendar. Check the logistics page for more information, including the official syllabus. Grades and assignments posted in ELMS.
